00057         public function __construct(F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager $componentManager, F3_MailformPlusPlus_Configuration $configuration) {

00069         protected function init() {
00070                 global $LANG;
00071                 $LANG->includeLLFile('EXT:mailformplusplus/Resources/Language/locallang.xml');
00072                 $this->logTable = 'tx_mailformplusplus_log';
00073         }
00074         
00081         public function process() {
00082                 global $LANG;
00083                 
00084                 //init 
00085                 $this->init();
00086                 
00087                 //init gp params
00088                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00089                 
00090                 //should delete records
00091                 if($params[delete] && isset($params['markedUids']) && is_array($params['markedUids'])) {
00092                         
00093                         //delete records
00094                         $this->deleteRecords($params['markedUids']);
00095                         
00096                         //select all records
00097                         $records = $this->fetchRecords();
00098                         
00099                         //show table
00100                         $table = $this->getTable($records);
00101                         
00102                         return $table;
00103                 }
00104                 
00105                 //should show index
00106                 if(!$params['detailId'] && !$params['markedUids']) {
00107                         
00108                         //if log table doesn't exist, show error
00109                         $tables = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->admin_get_tables();
00110                         if(!in_array($this->logTable,array_keys($tables))) {
00111                                 return $this->getErrorMessage();
00112                                 
00113                         //show index table
00114                         } else {
00115                                 
00116                                 //select all records
00117                                 $records = $this->fetchRecords();
00118                                 
00119                                 //show table
00120                                 $table = $this->getTable($records);
00121                                 return $table;
00122                         }
00123                         
00124                 //should export to some format
00125                 } elseif(!$params['delete']) {
00126                         
00127                         //should show detail view of a single record
00128                         if(!$params['renderMethod']) {
00129                                 
00130                                 return $this->showSingleView($params['detailId']);
00131                                 
00132                         //PDF generation
00133                         } elseif(!strcasecmp($params['renderMethod'],"pdf")) {
00134                                 
00135                                 //render a single record to PDF
00136                                 if($params['detailId']) {
00137                                         return $this->generatePDF($params['detailId']);
00138                                         
00139                                 //render many records to PDF
00140                                 } elseif(isset($params['markedUids']) && is_array($params['markedUids'])) {
00141                                         return $this->generatePDF($params['markedUids']);
00142                                 }
00143                                 
00144                         //CSV
00145                         } elseif(!strcasecmp($params['renderMethod'],"csv")) {
00146                                 
00147                                 //save single record as CSV
00148                                 if($params['detailId']) {
00149                                         return $this->generateCSV($params['detailId']);
00150                                         
00151                                 //save many records as CSV
00152                                 } elseif(isset($params['markedUids']) && is_array($params['markedUids'])) {
00153                                         return $this->generateCSV($params['markedUids']);
00154                                 }
00155                                 
00156                         }
00157                 }
00158         }
00159         
00167         protected function deleteRecords($uids) {
00168                 $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_DELETEquery($this->logTable,"uid IN (".implode(",",$uids).")");
00169         }
00170         
00180         protected function generatePDF($detailId) {
00181                 
00182                 /* 
00183                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00184                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash
00185                  */
00186                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00187                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00188                 }
00189                 
00190                 //init gp params
00191                 $gp = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00192                 
00193                 //select the records
00194                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("uid,pid,crdate,ip,params",$this->logTable,"uid IN (".implode(",",$detailId).")");
00195                 
00196                 //if records were found
00197                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00198                         $records = array();
00199                         $allParams = array();
00200                         
00201                         //loop through records
00202                         while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00203                                 
00204                                 //unserialize params and save the array
00205                                 $row['params'] = unserialize($row['params']);
00206                                 $records[] = $row;
00207                                 if(!is_array($row['params'])) {
00208                                         $row['params'] = array();
00209                                 }
00210                                 
00211                                 //sum up all params for selection view
00212                                 $allParams = array_merge($allParams,$row['params']);
00213                         }
00214                         
00215                         //if fields were chosen in selection view, export the records using the selected fields
00216                         if(isset($gp['exportParams'])) {
00217                                 $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_PDF");
00218                                 $generator->generateModulePDF($records,$gp['exportParams']);
00219                                 
00220                         /*
00221                          * show selection view to find out which fields to export.
00222                          * This enables the user to get rid of fields like submitted or mp-step
00223                          */
00224                         } else {
00225                                 return $this->generatePDFExportFieldsSelector($allParams);
00226                         }       
00227                 }
00228         }
00229         
00240         protected function generateCSV($detailId) {
00241                 
00242                 /* 
00243                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00244                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash
00245                  */
00246                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00247                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00248                 }
00249                 
00250                 //init gp params
00251                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00252                 
00253                 //select the records to export
00254                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("uid,pid,crdate,ip,params,key_hash",$this->logTable,"uid IN (".implode(",",$detailId).")");
00255                 
00256                 //if record were found
00257                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00258                         $records = array();
00259                         $count = 0;
00260                         $hashes = array();
00261                         $availableFormats = array();
00262                         
00263                         //loop through records
00264                         while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00265                                 
00266                                 //unserialize the params array
00267                                 $row['params'] = unserialize($row['params']);
00268                                 
00269                                 //find the amount of different formats to inform the user.
00270                                 if(!in_array($row['key_hash'],$hashes)) {
00271                                         $hashes[] = $row['key_hash'];
00272                                         $availableFormats[] = $row['params'];
00273                                 }
00274                                 $records[] = $row;
00275                         }
00276                         
00277                         $availableFormatsCount = count($hashes);
00278                         
00279                         //only one format found
00280                         if($availableFormatsCount == 1) {
00281                                 
00282                                 //if fields were chosen in the selection view, perform the export
00283                                 if(isset($params['exportParams'])) {
00284                                         $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_CSV");
00285                                         $generator->generateModuleCSV($renderRecords,$params['exportParams']);
00286                                         
00287                                 //no fields chosen, show selection view.
00288                                 } else {
00289                                         return $this->generateCSVExportFieldsSelector($renderRecords[0]['params']);
00290                                 }
00291                                 
00292                         //more than one format and user has chosen a format to export
00293                         } elseif(isset($params['csvFormat'])) {
00294                                 
00295                                 //select the format
00296                                 $format = $hashes[$params['csvFormat']];
00297                                 $renderRecords = array();
00298                                 
00299                                 //find out which records belong to this format
00300                                 foreach($records as $record) {
00301                                         if(!strcmp($record['key_hash'],$format)) {
00302                                                 $renderRecords[] = $record;
00303                                         }
00304                                 }
00305                                 
00306                                 //if fields were chosen in the selection view, perform the export
00307                                 if(isset($params['exportParams'])) {
00308                                         $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_CSV");
00309                                         $generator->generateModuleCSV($renderRecords,$params['exportParams']);
00310                                         
00311                                 //no fields chosen, show selection view.
00312                                 } else {
00313                                         return $this->generateCSVExportFieldsSelector($renderRecords[0]['params']);
00314                                 }
00315                                 
00316                         //more than one format and none chosen by now, show format selection view.
00317                         } else {
00318                                 return $this->generateFormatsSelector($availableFormats,$detailId);
00319                         }
00320                 }
00321         }
00322         
00331         protected function generateCSVExportFieldsSelector($params) {
00332                 
00333                 //if there are no params, initialize the array to ensure that foreach loops will not crash
00334                 if(!is_array($params)) {
00335                         $params = array();
00336                 }
00337                 
00338                 //init gp params
00339                 $gp = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00340                                 
00341                 //header
00342                 $selector = '<h3>Please select the fields to export:</h3><br />';
00343                 $selector .= '
00344                         <div style="width:200px;float:right">
00345                                 <input type="button" onclick="selectAll()" value="Select all" />
00346                                 <input type="button" onclick="deselectAll()" value="Deselect all" />
00347                         </div>
00348                 ';
00349                 
00350                 //start form with hidden fields holding the values of params of the steps before
00351                 $selector .= '<form id="mailformplusplus_module_form" action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'" method="post">';
00352                 
00353                 //the selected format to export
00354                 $selector .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[csvFormat]" value="'.$gp['csvFormat'].'" />';
00355                 
00356                 //the selected render method (csv/pdf), should be csv here
00357                 $selector .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[renderMethod]" value="'.$gp['renderMethod'].'" />';
00358                 
00359                 /* 
00360                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00361                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash.
00362                  * UIDs could be in param "markedUids" if more records where selected or in "detailId" if only one record get exported.
00363                  */
00364                 $detailId = $gp['markedUids'];
00365                 if(!$detailId) {
00366                         $detailId = $gp['detailId'];
00367                 }
00368                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00369                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00370                 }
00371                 
00372                 //the selected records in a previous step
00373                 foreach($detailId as $id) {
00374                         $selector .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[markedUids][]" value="'.$id.'" />';
00375                 }
00376                 
00377                 //start output table
00378                 $selector .= '<table>';
00379                 
00380                 //add a label and a checkbox for each available parameter
00381                 foreach($params as $field=>$value) {
00382                         $selector .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="'.$field.'">'.$field.'</td></tr>';
00383                 }
00384                 
00385                 //add submite button and close form
00386                 $selector .= '</table><input type="submit" value="Export" /></form>';
00387                 
00388                 //add javascript for "select all" and "deselect all"
00389                 $selector .= $this->getSelectionJS();
00390                 return $selector;
00391         }

00401         protected function generatePDFExportFieldsSelector($params) {
00402                 
00403                 //if there are no params, initialize the array to ensure that foreach loops will not crash
00404                 if(!is_array($params)) {
00405                         $params = array();
00406                 }
00407                 
00408                 //init gp params
00409                 $gp = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00410                 
00411                 //header
00412                 $selector = '<h3>Please select the fields to export:</h3><br />';
00413                 $selector .= '
00414                         <div style="width:200px;float:right">
00415                                 <input type="button" onclick="selectAll()" value="Select all" />
00416                                 <input type="button" onclick="deselectAll()" value="Deselect all" />
00417                         </div>
00418                 ';
00419                 
00420                 //start form with hidden fields holding the values of params of the steps before
00421                 $selector .= '<form id="mailformplusplus_module_form" action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'" method="post">';
00422                 
00423                 //the selected render method (csv/pdf), should be pdf here
00424                 $selector .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[renderMethod]" value="'.$gp['renderMethod'].'" />';
00425                 
00426                 /* 
00427                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00428                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash.
00429                  * UIDs could be in param "markedUids" if more records where selected or in "detailId" if only one record get exported.
00430                  */
00431                 $detailId = $gp['markedUids'];
00432                 if(!$detailId) {
00433                         $detailId = $gp['detailId'];
00434                 }
00435                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00436                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00437                 }
00438                 
00439                 //the selected records in a previous step
00440                 foreach($detailId as $id) {
00441                         $selector .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[markedUids][]" value="'.$id.'" />';
00442                 }
00443                 
00444                 //start output table with the default fields that can be exported (ip address, submission date and PID)
00445                 $selector .= '<table>';
00446                 $selector .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="ip">IP address</td></tr>';
00447                 $selector .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="submission_date">Submission date</td></tr>';
00448                 $selector .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="pid">Page ID</td></tr>';
00449                 $selector .= '</table>';
00450                 $selector .= '<table>';
00451                 
00452                 //add a label and a checkbox for each available parameter
00453                 foreach($params as $field=>$value) {
00454                         $selector .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[exportParams][]" value="'.$field.'">'.$field.'</td></tr>';
00455                 }
00456                 
00457                 //add submit button and close form
00458                 $selector .= '</table><input type="submit" value="Export" /></form>';
00459                 
00460                 //add javascript for "select all" and "deselect all"
00461                 $selector .= $this->getSelectionJS();
00462                 return $selector;
00463         }
00464         
00471         protected function getSelectionJS() {
00472                 return '<script type="text/javascript">
00473                                 function selectAll() {
00474                                   var form = document.getElementById("mailformplusplus_module_form");
00475                                   var inputs = form.getElementsByTagName("input");
00476                                   for(var i=0;i<inputs.length;i++) {
00477                                     if(inputs[i].type == "checkbox") {
00478                                       inputs[i].checked = "checked";    
00479                                         }       
00480                                   }     
00481                                 }
00482                                 
00483                                 function deselectAll() {
00484                                   var form = document.getElementById("mailformplusplus_module_form");
00485                                   var inputs = form.getElementsByTagName("input");
00486                                   for(var i=0;i<inputs.length;i++) {
00487                                     if(inputs[i].type == "checkbox") {
00488                                       inputs[i].checked = null; 
00489                                         }       
00490                                   }     
00491                                 }
00492                         </script>
00493                 ';
00494         }

00505         protected function generateFormatsSelector($formats,$detailId) {
00506                 /* 
00507                  * if there is only one record to export, initialize an array with the one uid
00508                  * to ensure that foreach loops will not crash.
00509                  */
00510                 if(!is_array($detailId)) {
00511                         $detailId = array($detailId);
00512                 }
00513                 
00514                 //header
00515                 $selector .= '<h3>'.count($formats).' formats found please export them in seperate files!</h3><br />';
00516                 
00517                 //start table
00518                 $selector .= '<table>';
00519                 
00520                 //loop through formats
00521                 foreach($formats as $key=>$format) {
00522                         
00523                         //if format is valid
00524                         if(isset($format) && is_array($format)) {
00525                                 
00526                                 //start a form
00527                                 $selector .= '
00528                                         <tr><td>
00529                                                         <form action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'" method="post">
00530                                 ';
00531                                 
00532                                 //add hidden fields for all selected records to export
00533                                 foreach($detailId as $id) {
00534                                         $selector .= '<input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[markedUids][]" value="'.$id.'" />';
00535                                 }
00536                                 
00537                                 //add hidden fields for the current format and the render method CSV
00538                                 $selector .= '
00539                                                         <input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[csvFormat]" value="'.$key.'" />
00540                                                         <input type="hidden" name="mailformplusplus[renderMethod]" value="csv" />
00541                                                         <input type="submit" value="Export" />
00542                                                         </form>
00543                                                 </td>
00544                                                 <td>'.implode(",",array_keys($format)).'</td>
00545                                         </tr>
00546                                 ';
00547                         }
00548                 }
00549                 
00550                 //close table, add back link and return
00551                 $selector .= '</table><br /><hr /><a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'">Back</a>';
00552                 return $selector;
00553         }

00562         protected function showSingleView($singleUid) {
00563                 
00564                 //select the record
00565                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("uid,pid,crdate,ip,params",$this->logTable,"uid=".$singleUid);
00566                 
00567                 //if UID was valid
00568                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00569                         $row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res);
00570                         
00571                         //unserialize params
00572                         $params = unserialize($row['params']);
00573                         
00574                         //start with default fields (IP address, submission date, PID)
00575                         $view = '
00576                                 <div>
00577                                         <div>
00578                                                 <div style="width:100px;float:left"><h4>PID</h4></div>
00579                                                 <div style="width:100px;float:left">'.$row['pid'].'</div>
00580                                                 <div style="clear:both"></div>
00581                                         </div>
00582                                         <div>
00583                                                 <div style="width:100px;float:left"><h4>Date</h4></div>
00584                                                 <div style="width:200px;float:left">'.date("d.m.Y H:i",$row['crdate']).'</div>
00585                                                 <div style="clear:both"></div>
00586                                         </div>
00587                                         <div>
00588                                                 <div style="width:100px;float:left"><h4>IP</h4></div>
00589                                                 <div style="width:100px;float:left">'.$row['ip'].'</div>
00590                                                 <div style="clear:both"></div>
00591                                         </div>
00592                                         <div>
00593                                                 <div style="width:100px;"><h4>Params</h4></div>
00594                                                 <div style="width:300px;margin-left:30px;">
00595                         ';
00596                         
00597                         //add the submitted params
00598                         if(isset($params) && is_array($params)) {
00599                                 $view .= '<table>';
00600                                 foreach($params as $key=>$value) {
00601                                         if(is_array($value)) {
00602                                                 $value = implode(",",$value);
00603                                         }
00604                                         $view .= '
00605                                                 <tr>
00606                                                         <td style="font-weight:bold">'.$key.'</td>
00607                                                         <td>'.$value.'</td>
00608                                                 </tr>
00609                                         ';
00610                                 }
00611                                 $view .= '</table>';
00612                         }
00613                         
00614                         //add buttons to export the record and a back link
00615                         $view .= '                      
00616                                                 </div>
00617                                         </div>
00618                                         <hr />
00619                                         <div>
00620                                                 <strong>Export as:  </strong><a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$row['uid'].'&mailformplusplus[renderMethod]=pdf">PDF</a>
00621                                                 /<a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$row['uid'].'&mailformplusplus[renderMethod]=csv">CSV</a>
00622                                         </div>
00623                                         <div style="margin-top:30px;font-weight:bold;text-decoration:underline;">
00624                                                 <a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'">back</a>
00625                                         </div>
00626                                 </div>
00627                         ';
00628                         return $view;
00629                 }
00630         }

00638         protected function getErrorMessage() {
00639                 return '
00640                         <div style="color:dd7777;font-weight:bold;font-size:11px;">
00641                                 <br />
00642                                 <p style="color:dd7777;font-weight:bold;font-size:11px;">'.$LANG->getLL('noLogTable').'</p>
00643                                 <br />
00644                                 <br />
00645                                 <p style="color:dd7777;font-weight:bold;font-size:11px;">TypoScript:</p><br />
00646                                 <span style="font-family:Monospace;color:dd7777;font-weight:bold;font-size:11px;">
00647                                         plugin.F3_MailformPlusPlus.settings.loggers.1 {<br />
00648                                                 class = F3_MailformPlusPlus_Logger_Default      <br />
00649                                         } <br />
00650                                 </span>
00651                         </div>
00652                 ';
00653         }
00654         
00661         protected function fetchRecords() {
00662                 $records = array();
00663                 
00664                 //build WHERE clause
00665                 $where = $this->buildWhereClause();
00666                 
00667                 //select the records
00668                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("uid,pid,crdate,ip,params",$this->logTable,$where);
00669                 
00670                 //if records found
00671                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00672                         $count = 0;
00673                         while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00674                                 $records[$count] = $row;
00675                                 $count++;
00676                         }
00677                 }
00678                 return $records;
00679         }
00680         
00687         protected function buildWhereClause() {
00688                 
00689                 //init gp params
00690                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00691                 $where = array();
00692                 
00693                 //if only records of a specific PID should be shown
00694                 if(strlen(trim($params['pidFilter'])) > 0) {
00695                         $where[] = "pid IN (".$params['pidFilter'].")";
00696                 }
00697                 
00698                 //only records submitted after given timestamp
00699                 if(strlen(trim($params['startdateFilter'])) > 0) {
00700                         $tstamp = $this->dateToTimestamp($params['startdateFilter']);
00701                         $where[] = "crdate >= ".$tstamp;
00702                 }
00703                 
00704                 //only records submitted before given timestamp
00705                 if(strlen(trim($params['enddateFilter'])) > 0) {
00706                         $tstamp = $this->dateToTimestamp($params['enddateFilter'],true);
00707                         $where[] = "crdate <= ".$tstamp;
00708                 }
00709                 
00710                 //if filter was applied, return the WHERE clause
00711                 if(count($where) > 0) {
00712                         return implode(" AND ",$where);
00713                 }
00714         }
00715         
00724         protected function dateToTimestamp($date,$end = false) {
00725                 $dateArr = explode(".",$date);
00726                 if($end) {
00727                         return mktime(23,59,59,$dateArr[1],$dateArr[0],$dateArr[2]);
00728                 }
00729                 return mktime(0,0,0,$dateArr[1],$dateArr[0],$dateArr[2]);
00730         }
00731         
00738         protected function getFilterSection() {
00739                 
00740                 //init gp params
00741                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00742                 
00743                 //generate form
00744                 $filter = '
00745                         <form action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'" method="post">
00746                         <div>
00747                                 <h2 style="text-align:center">Filter</h2>
00748                                 <table>
00749                                         <tr>
00750                                                 <td><strong>PID (comma seperated)</strong></td>
00751                                                 <td>
00752                                                         <input type="text" name="mailformplusplus[pidFilter]" value="'.$params['pidFilter'].'"/>
00753                                                 </td>
00754                                         </tr>
00755                                         <tr>
00756                                                 <td><strong>Startdate</strong></td>
00757                                                 <td>
00758                                                         <input type="text" readonly="readonly" id="startdate" value="'.$params['startdateFilter'].'" name="mailformplusplus[startdateFilter]" />
00759                                                         <input type="button" id="trigger_startdate" value="Cal"/>
00760                                                 </td>
00761                                         </tr>
00762                                         <tr>
00763                                                 <td><strong>Enddate</strong></td>
00764                                                 <td>
00765                                                         <input type="text" readonly="readonly" id="enddate" value="'.$params['enddateFilter'].'" name="mailformplusplus[enddateFilter]" />
00766                                                         <input type="button" id="trigger_enddate" value="Cal"/>
00767                                                 </td>
00768                                         </tr>
00769                                         <tr>
00770                                                 <td><input type="submit" value="Filter" /></td>
00771                                                 <td>&nbsp;</td>
00772                                         </tr>
00773                                 </table>
00774                         </div>
00775                         </form>';
00776                         
00777                 //add JavaScript for Popup calendar
00778                 $filter .= '
00779                         <hr />
00780                 ';
00781                 $filter .= $this->getCalendarJS();
00782                         
00783                 return $filter;
00784         }
00785 
00792         protected function getCalendarJS() {
00793                 return '<style type="text/css">@import url(../../../Resources/JS/jscalendar-1.0/skins/aqua/theme.css);</style>
00794                         <script type="text/javascript" src="../../../Resources/JS/jscalendar-1.0/calendar.js"></script>
00795                         <script type="text/javascript" src="../../../Resources/JS/jscalendar-1.0/lang/calendar-en.js"></script>
00796                         <script type="text/javascript" src="../../../Resources/JS/jscalendar-1.0/calendar-setup.js"></script>
00797 
00798                         <script type="text/javascript">
00799                                 Calendar.setup(
00800                                     {
00801                                       inputField  : "startdate",         // ID of the input field
00802                                       ifFormat    : "%d.%m.%Y",    // the date format
00803                                       button      : "trigger_startdate"       // ID of the button
00804                                     }
00805                                   );
00806                                  Calendar.setup(
00807                                     {
00808                                       inputField  : "enddate",         // ID of the input field
00809                                       ifFormat    : "%d.%m.%Y",    // the date format
00810                                       button      : "trigger_enddate"       // ID of the button
00811                                     }
00812                                   );
00813         
00814                         </script>
00815                 ';
00816         }
00817         
00825         protected function getTable(&$records) {
00826                 if(count($records) == 0) {
00827                         return "<div>No records found!</div>";
00828                 }
00829                 
00830                 
00831                 //init gp params
00832                 $params = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00833                 
00834                 //get filter
00835                 $table = $this->getFilterSection();
00836                 
00837                 //add JavaScript
00838                 $table .= $this->getSelectionJS();
00839                 
00840                 //add "Export as" and "Select all", "Deselect all" options
00841                 $table .= '
00842                         <form id="mailformplusplus_module_form" action="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'" method="post">
00843                         <div>
00844                         <div style="width:250px;float:left">
00845                                 Export selected as: 
00846                                 <input type="submit" value="PDF" name="mailformplusplus[renderMethod]" />
00847                                 <input type="submit" value="CSV" name="mailformplusplus[renderMethod]" />
00848                         </div>
00849                         <div style="width:200px;float:left;">
00850                                 <input type="submit" value="Delete selected" name="mailformplusplus[delete]" />
00851                         </div>
00852                         <div style="width:200px;float:right">
00853                                 <input type="button" onclick="selectAll()" value="Select all" />
00854                                 <input type="button" onclick="deselectAll()" value="Deselect all" />
00855                         </div>
00856                         <div style="clear:both;"></div>
00857                         </div>
00858                 ';
00859                 
00860                 //start table
00861                 $table .= '
00862                         <!--<script src="../../../Resources/JS/sorttable.js"></script>-->
00863                         
00864                         <table class="sortable">
00865                                 <tr style="font-size:large;font-weight:bold;background: #cccccc;">
00866                                         <td>PID</th>
00867                                         <td>Submission date</th>
00868                                         <td>IP</th>
00869                                         <td>Detail View</th>
00870                                         <td>Export</th>
00871                                         <td>&nbsp;</th>
00872                                 </tr>
00873                         ';
00874                 
00875                 $count = 1;
00876                 
00877                 //add records
00878                 foreach($records as $record) {
00879                         if($count % 2 == 0) {
00880                                 $style="";              
00881                         } else {
00882                                 $style="background-color:#dedede";
00883                         }
00884                         $table .= '
00885                                 <tr style="'.$style.'">
00886                                         <td>'.$record['pid'].'</td>
00887                                         <td>'.date('d.m.Y H:i',$record['crdate']).'</td>
00888                                         <td>'.$record['ip'].'</td>
00889                                         <td><a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$record['uid'].'">Show</a></td>
00890                                         <td>
00891                                                 <a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$record['uid'].'&mailformplusplus[renderMethod]=pdf">PDF</a>
00892                                                 /<a href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?mailformplusplus[detailId]='.$record['uid'].'&mailformplusplus[renderMethod]=csv">CSV</a>
00893                                         </td>
00894                                         <td><input type="checkbox" name="mailformplusplus[markedUids][]" value="'.$record['uid'].'" ';
00895                                 if(isset($params['markedUids']) && is_array($params['markedUids']) && in_array($record['uid'],$params['markedUids'])) {
00896                                         $table .= 'checked="checked"';
00897                                 }
00898                                 $table .= '     
00899                                         /></td>
00900                                 </tr>
00901                         ';
00902                         $count++;
00903                 }
00904                 
00905                 //add Export as option
00906                 $table .= '
00907                         </table>
00908                         Export selected as: 
00909                         <input type="submit" value="PDF" name="mailformplusplus[renderMethod]" />
00910                         <input type="submit" value="CSV" name="mailformplusplus[renderMethod]" />
00911                         </form>
00912                 ';
00913                 return $table;
00914         }
